name: Verify social media links
description:
As a user
  I want to check social media links
  So that I can follow the company on different platforms
descriptionHtml:
As a user
I want to check social media links
So that I can follow the company on different platforms
statusMessage: Expected URL: https://web.facebook.com/saucelabs?_rdc=1&_rdr, but got: https://www.facebook.com/saucelabs expected [true] but found [false]
statusTrace:
java.lang.AssertionError: Expected URL: https://web.facebook.com/saucelabs?_rdc=1&_rdr, but got: https://www.facebook.com/saucelabs expected [true] but found [false]
	at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:111)
	at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1578)
	at org.testng.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:57)
	at com.group_29.ui_testing.stepdefinitions.SocialMediaRedirects.verifyRedirection(SocialMediaRedirects.java:23)
	at ✽.I should be redirected to "https://web.facebook.com/saucelabs?_rdc=1&_rdr"(file:///home/runner/work/Group-29/Group-29/UI_Testing/src/test/resources/features/socialMediaRedirects.feature:10)
